description: Although Yster’s crash is now a family of six, he remains best friends with Anchor and the two are rarely found apart. This crash of orphans has been affectionately called “The CRAFTY 6’’ with the name originating from the first letter of all of their names. Yster is wary of strangers, but with those he knows, he is very sweet and affectionate. Yster drinks 16L of milk a day and will continue to drink milk until the age of about 16 months old.
name: Yster
